channel.title: Morning Briefing · Deals
channel.description: Daily AU commercial property briefing — assets, funds, deals, development.

item.title: Jim Carrey's Mansion Sells at a Steep Discount
item.description: After two long years on the market, Jim Carrey's estate has finally found a buyer, but not without a hefty markdown. The Hollywood star's property saga highlights the challenges in the luxury market. If you're in asset management or development, take note—price adjustments might be the new norm.
item.content:encoded: After two long years on the market, Jim Carrey's estate has finally found a buyer, but not without a hefty markdown. The Hollywood star's property saga highlights the challenges in the luxury market. If you're in asset management or development, take note—price adjustments might be the new norm.

item.title: Solar Home Batteries Set for $800M Sales Surge
item.description: Thanks to a new federal rebate, solar home battery sales are projected to skyrocket by $800 million next year. Time to plug into this booming market and consider how it might impact your asset strategies.
item.content:encoded: Thanks to a new federal rebate, solar home battery sales are projected to skyrocket by $800 million next year. Time to plug into this booming market and consider how it might impact your asset strategies.

item.title: 70-Year-Old Beachfront Shack Fetches Big Bucks
item.description: An original beachfront home, untouched for decades and owned by the same family for three generations, has just sold for a jaw-dropping price. This £300 shack proves that even the most unassuming properties can command stunning sales in the right market.
item.content:encoded: An original beachfront home, untouched for decades and owned by the same family for three generations, has just sold for a jaw-dropping price. This £300 shack proves that even the most unassuming properties can command stunning sales in the right market.

item.title: Surf’s up for Surfection founder with circa $23m sale
item.description: A northside businessman and avid surfer has cashed in on his Golden Mile designer home, selling it within the $22m-$24m range. A solid move in the high-end market!
item.content:encoded: A northside businessman and avid surfer has cashed in on his Golden Mile designer home, selling it within the $22m-$24m range. A solid move in the high-end market!

item.title: Maddingley Agent's Viral Sales Pitch: 'F***ing Nice House'
item.description: A Victorian home is turning heads thanks to an agent's blunt but effective three-word sales pitch. Buyers are flocking to see what makes this property so irresistible. Sometimes, less is more, right?
item.content:encoded: A Victorian home is turning heads thanks to an agent's blunt but effective three-word sales pitch. Buyers are flocking to see what makes this property so irresistible. Sometimes, less is more, right?

item.title: Massive Discounts on Land Lots in Victoria
item.description: Attention buyers: You’ve got just three days to snag up to $48K off residential land lots across Victoria. Don’t let this opportunity slip through your fingers!
item.content:encoded: Attention buyers: You’ve got just three days to snag up to $48K off residential land lots across Victoria. Don’t let this opportunity slip through your fingers!
